title: Mouse problem
body: While in game, my mouse 'click' sometimes wont register. My game will still run, i can move my mouse cursor but none of the clicks will do anything for a few seconds

replies.body: Same thing is happening to me. Any one got anything on this? My mouse is fairly new Logitech G402

Do you run any sort of VOIP applications in the background, such as Skype, Discord, or Curse Voice? Some of these applications can interfere with League, your mouse or keyboard during a match. I recommend you [**complete a clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to ensure no background applications are causing this issue to occur.

Let me know if this helped.
